channel.title: Comments on: Your Guild is a Quagmire

item.title: By: Chas
item.dc:creator: Chas
item.description: I have to agree with you- and size doesn't matter! My City of Heroes Supergroup consists of my wife, myself, and my best friend, and let me tell you, at LEAST 2/3 of them are drama queens to the core!
item.content:encoded: I have to agree with you- and size doesn’t matter! My City of Heroes Supergroup consists of my wife, myself, and my best friend, and let me tell you, at LEAST 2/3 of them are drama queens to the core!

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: Respond to every tell with either "hmm", "right on", or "lol" and you will soon find that every single person that talks to you considers you their best friend. They will then whine about all their problems to you. Dont respond with anything longer than the previously mentioned responses! OR drama be thy fate
item.content:encoded: Respond to every tell with either “hmm”, “right on”, or “lol” and you will soon find that every single person that talks to you considers you their best friend. They will then whine about all their problems to you. Dont respond with anything longer than the previously mentioned responses! OR drama be thy fate

item.title: By: romp
item.dc:creator: romp
item.description: yah, if your guild has no drama queen, then the drama queen is YOU!
item.content:encoded: yah, if your guild has no drama queen, then the drama queen is YOU!

item.title: By: Jason
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.description: I've often found it true that if you think your guild is boring and you never hear any stories about crazy guildmates its usually because YOU are the crazy guildmate other people talk about. The silence in your guildchat is them being quiet when you are around.
item.content:encoded: I’ve often found it true that if you think your guild is boring and you never hear any stories about crazy guildmates its usually because YOU are the crazy guildmate other people talk about. The silence in your guildchat is them being quiet when you are around.
